articles.description: Microsoft acknowledged and addressed an issue that caused boot failure for some PCs that used the Check Disk. The issue is now resolved and should be prevented automatically.
articles.content: Microsoft acknowledged and rolled out a fix for an issue that caused booting to fail on some Windows 10 devices following the use of the chkdsk (Check Desk) tool. As pointed out by Bleeping Computer,… [+2131 chars]

articles.content:
